WorkItem.Description:
Sometimes after starting the application and loading a character, as soon as I move the mouse over any one of the equipped items I get an unhandled exception. Everything seems to be working if I click "Continue" on the exception box.
 
The exception message is copy/pasted here:
 
See the end of this message for details on invoking 
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.
 
************** Exception Text **************
System.ArgumentException: Parameter is not valid.
at System.Drawing.Image.get_Width()
at System.Drawing.Image.get_Size()
at System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.CreateBitmap(Original original, Boolean& ownsBitmap)
at System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.CreateHandle()
at System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.get_Handle()
at System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.GetBitmap(Int32 index)
at System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.get_Item(Int32 index)
at System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.get_Item(String key)
at Rawr.ItemIcons.GetItemIcon(String iconName, Boolean small)
at Rawr.ItemIcons.GetItemIcon(Item item, Boolean small)
at Rawr.ItemToolTip.get_CachedToolTipImage()
at Rawr.ItemToolTip.Show(Item item, IWin32Window window, Point point)
at Rawr.ItemButton.ItemButton_MouseEnter(Object sender, EventArgs e)
at System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter(EventArgs e)
at System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseEnter(EventArgs eventargs)
at System.Windows.Forms.Button.OnMouseEnter(EventArgs e)
at System.Windows.Forms.Control.WmMouseEnter(Message& m)
at System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(Message& m)
at System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.WndProc(Message& m)
at System.Windows.Forms.Button.WndProc(Message& m)
at System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlNativeWindow.OnMessage(Message& m)
at System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlNativeWindow.WndProc(Message& m)
at System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Callback(IntPtr hWnd, Int32 msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam)

Comments.Message: I'll take a look at that, thanks. Sounds like it's assuming it's got the icon for the gems in whatever you mouse over, but doesn't yet.
